biotools.summary: mrCaNaVaR is a copy number caller that analyzes the next-generation sequence mapping read depth to discover large segmental duplications and deletions. It also has the capability of predicting absolute copy numbers of genomic intervals.

bioschemas.name: MrCaNaVaR
